com.netty.demo

Class Upgrade

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netty.demo.Upgrade

  • public class Upgrade
extends java.lang.Object
    Upgrades your account from the Demo version to the full play game.
    Author:
    Josh

    • Constructor Detail

      • Upgrade

        public Upgrade(java.lang.String name,
       java.lang.String pass,
       java.lang.String emailAddress)
        Constructs a new Upgrade for the Player to use when he's finished with the Demo. In order to "upgrade", we must check for certain criteria to be met in order to move on with the gameplay.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Player so we can figure out who's who.
        pass - The password of the Player so we can match it up with the name.
        emailAddress - The email address used when creating the Character.

    • Method Detail

      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String name)
        In order to find who the Player is, we must create its name. This is by far the most important/used when it comes to identification and clarification.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Player.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        We'll get the name in order to see who is able to Upgrade and who isn't.
        Returns:
        name Gets the name of the Player.

      • setPass

        public void setPass(java.lang.String pass)
        The name of the Player along with the password will be matched up to see if it is the Player.
        Parameters:
        pass -
